meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Debbie Singer Sandy Howard Matthew Church Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6732.

td.p: Debbie Singer, an attorney from Evanston, Illinois
Sandy Howard, a homemaker from Cincinnati, Ohio
Matthew Church, a medical student from Prince George, British Columbia, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,000)

tr.td: O CHRISTMAS TREE
THE CONFEDERACY
GETTIN' YOUR DRINK ON
ELEMENTAL ETYMOLOGY
TV
RHYME SPREE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Jimmy of the Clue Crew presents.) In 1948, President Truman signaled the lighting of the White House Christmas tree via remote control from his home in this state, 900 miles away')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew presents.) In 1948, President Truman signaled the lighting of the White House Christmas tree via remote control from his home in this state, 900 miles away
